synopsis.text: Bei In a universe where heroes maintain harmony, a flaming meteor plummets onto Neo World, disrupting the equilibrium. Amidst the chaos emerges Wukong Impulse Gundam, a young amnesiac who finds himself at the epicenter of the catastrophe. As turmoil unfolds and engulfs neighboring realms, Zhuge Liang Freedom Gundam, a stargazer, foresees imminent doom. Joined by his steadfast ally, Liu Bei Unicorn Gundam, they embark on a mission to salvage their worlds from impending disaster, accompanied by the enigmatic Wukong. As they traverse the realms, will Wukong prove to be a harbinger of tranquility or a catalyst for chaos? The saga of these heroes unfolds, as they strive to restore balance and prevent catastrophe.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
